Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Enacts the Growing the Advanced Media Economy Act ; and provides for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Allows a tax credit for a taxpayer which is a digital gaming media production entity engaged in qualified digital gaming media production, or who is a sole proprietor of or a member of a partnership, which is a digital gaming media production entity engaged in qualified digital gaming media production; provides for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof.
LawCode: Add §45, amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L; add §242, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the economic development law, in relation to enacting the "Growing the Advanced Media Economy Act"; and to provide for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof
